parameters.subject: =Thanks for contacting us, {{ $('Update record').item.json.fields.Name }}!
parameters.message:
=Hi {{ $('Update record').item.json.fields.Name }},

Thank you for reaching out to us at {{ $('Update record').item.json.fields.Company }} regarding {{ $('Update record').item.json.fields['Service Needed'] }}.

Our team will contact you shortly to get started on your request.

If you have any questions, feel free to reply to this email.

Best regards,
Client Onboarding Team

parameters.name: body
parameters.value:
=Hi {{ $json.fields.Name }},

Thanks for contacting us — we’re excited to help you! 🙌

To move things forward, could you please reply to this email with your WhatsApp number?

It’ll help us connect with you faster and complete your onboarding.

Looking forward to your reply!

— Team [Your Name]

Please complete your onboarding by paying here:

Let us know if you need any help. – Team

parameters.name: body
parameters.value:
=Hi {{ $json.fields.Name }}, 👋

Thanks for your payment! 🎉  
Your onboarding is now confirmed ✅

You can access details visiting our website: 
https://client-onboard-status.lovable.app

We'll reach out soon with next steps.

– Team

parameters.name: body
parameters.value:
=Hi {{ $json.fields.Name }}, 👋

Thanks for reaching out!

To proceed with your onboarding, please upload all the required documents using the link below:

📎 Upload Documents: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSevoohsbEIZLuYWOgmxMiNpr9IwhKoAMKRBBEOtz3cAvq_PuQ/viewform

Once you’ve submitted the form, we’ll review everything and get back to you shortly.

Let us know if you have any questions.

— Team

parameters.name: body
parameters.value:
=Hi {{ $json['Name'] }}, 👋

Just a quick reminder — we haven’t received your onboarding documents yet.

To move forward, please upload the required documents here:
📎 https://forms.gle/YOUR_GOOGLE_FORM_ID

Completing this step will help us begin your service without delays.

Let us know if you’re facing any issues. We're here to help! 😊

— Team [Your Company Name]

parameters.name: body
parameters.value:
=Hi {{ $json.fields.Name }}, 🙏

Thank you for submitting your documents — we’ve received them successfully! 📂✅

Our team will now review everything and get back to you shortly with the next steps.

If you have any questions in the meantime, feel free to message us.

— Team [Your Company Name]

parameters.content:
Workflow I
Phase I
Three main entry points : 1-> Whatsapp text 2-> Google form/sheets 3-> Gmail

Phase II
Store the extracted User details i.e name, email, contact... in "Airtable"

Phase III.I
Sends Google Form to collect User relevant Documents

WorkFlow II
Phase I
Triggers when user fill the relevant documents using Google Forms Link ie. Workflow I, Phase III.I through Whatsapp message
Stores the submitted documents to the airtable

Condition if user uploaded the data
true -> Send a thanksgiving message to upload documents
false -> Send the form url again and ask user to upload documents again.

Phase III.II
Message OpenAi to give [Client Score] on the base of their service reqeuired with [Scoring Reason]

Phase IV

Switch1:
Routes items based on their score value to one of three outputs: "In Progress" (score ≥ 8), "Follow-up Needed" (score ≥ 5), or "New" (score ≥ 0).

Edit Fields1:
Sets the field Client Status to "In Progress" for items from the first Switch1 output.

Edit Fields4:
Sets the field Client Status to "Follow-up Needed" for items from the second Switch1 output.

Edit Fields5:
Sets the field Client Status to "New" for items from the third Switch1 output.

Merge1:
Combines the outputs from the three Set nodes back into a single stream for further processing.

Phase V
Update record:
Updates a client record in Airtable with the latest score, status, and reason.

HTTP Request1:
Sends a WhatsApp message to the client using UltraMsg API, with personalized content.

Send a message:
Sends a personalized thank-you email to the client using Gmail.

Get a record:
Retrieves the updated client record from Airtable for further use.

Phase VI
Switch:
Routes items based on Client Score to "High Priority" (≥8), "Moderate Priority" (≥5), or "Low Priority" (≥0).

HTTP Request:
Sends a WhatsApp message for high-priority clients to the senior sales executive.

HTTP Request2:
Sends a WhatsApp message for moderate-priority clients to the junior sales executive.

HTTP Request3:
Sends a WhatsApp message for low-priority clients to the sales assistant.

Merge2:
Combines the outputs from all three HTTP Request nodes into a single stream.

Phase VII
HTTP Request4:
Creates a Razorpay payment link for the client using their details and service information.

Update record2:
Updates the Airtable client record with the generated Razorpay payment link ID.

Razorpay payment:
Sends a WhatsApp message to the client with the payment link for onboarding completion.

Workflow III

Razorpay Webhook:
Receives payment update notifications from Razorpay.

Extract Payment Info:
Extracts key payment details (email, contact, status, payment link ID, name) from the webhook data.

Search records:
Searches Airtable for the client record matching the received payment link ID.

Get a record1:
Retrieves the full client record from Airtable using the found record ID.

Update record1:
Updates the Airtable client record with payment status, currency, amount paid, and marks status as "Completed".

HTTP Request5:
Sends a WhatsApp confirmation message to the client after successful payment.
